items.title: Setting up my EMDiscussions Blog
items.summary: Up to now, I've posted any email-related 'stuff' on my personal blog, but have now decided to post that content on a separate blog. So, here it is! I'll be looking into copying my already existing posts over to this blog very soon.
items.content_html:
Up to now, I've posted any email-related 'stuff' on my personal blog, but have now decided to post that content on a separate blog.

So, here it is!

I'll be looking into copying my already existing posts over to this blog very soon.
